title: Ranked Been placed from Gold to Silver now Demoted after troll after troll
body:
Ranked Been placed from Gold to Silver now 
Demoted after troll after troll 

I had a kindred jungle troll 2 deaths rage quit 
then i ve had a game with a rammus die 6 times then quit 
this is unfair i am loosing like 23 LP for something i dont even do ranked is not a fair system if the other players are punished for others inconsistencies....

I dont understand i keep getting placed with team mates that know nothing to no pathing or skills and they are GOLD or silver for there first season i know riot did give them a higher ELO this season. makes no logical sense to me 

i was gold i have had that many losses and demoted back to silver 2   not BECAUSE of my play style or who i play but other team mates just feed there asses out DONT listen in a TEAM game and just continue to drag others down its not a positive system anymore to play rank it does not have a realistic result when u get 15 lp for a win and loose LP for a loss

you can carry on saying you u not tilt which i dont.......... but nothing you can do 4 v 5 the higher percentage of them winning a game is ALOT higher then 4 team mates lets be logical here. if you cared about PLAYERS you would actually amend ranked and fix it and have a level cap to play it 

if they wanna troll or try out new champs do it in Bots or norms not in ranked. its just a waste of time and other peoples time and its depressing if you really care about the players do something cause negativity continues you will loose money but you wont ban players its another one on your list thats playing right riot... more money in your pocket.

replies.body:
an important thing to remember, is what made you gold in the first place.
Was it onetricking a champion that clicked with you,
was it studying jungle rotations and understanding lane push patterns,
was it csing and controlling minion waves,
was it knowing exactly how to win lane matchups and snowball,
was it vision/map awareness and shotcalling.

If you did it once, you can do it again, and regardless of the monkeys on your team, you need to focus on yourself, because in the end both sides will get monkeys sometimes, did you watch the map, did you play the matchups right, did you make the right calls, were you capitalizing on vision information, did you make the right picks, did you choose the right rotations.

Play it right and at worst you can have upto 4 monkeys on your team, whereas the enemy team can have upto 5. Climbing is about yourself and beating the averages.
lol yeah just keep getting that yasuo top lane pick silver 2 that has a match history higher deaths then kills and dies 10 times and leaves game saying job is done.

Are you guys so delusional you think the enemy team dont have the same problem you do? 

Everyones are put in the same battle ground and all the mess that come with it; **The difference is, ability**. The ones that are bellow the average, and have too big of an ego to admit the skills different, tend to point finger away from their own ability.

majority of the time they are winning, and If the enemy team has the same problem as a afk it is reported but its 1 percent chance compared to when you play and get a troll mid laner annie die 10 times and laugh say its only a game and is gold 3 #rankedisjustforfun to annnie

Over a sample size of a bunch of games this is true, however for a run of games you can be placed with the monkey teams one day, and then versus the monkeys the next day. People don't lose 10 games in a row one day and then win 10 games in a row the next just because their skill level changed dramatically over those 2 days.

I find that in low elo, a few things are prevalent:

1) Players have no balls, they can't control their emotions. This makes them less objective in game. For example one game i went 2/10/10 as a rammus jungle. The game was totally winnable, despite the team flaming me for "feeding". But their attitude was simply to meme and flame, they didn't wanna win the game. For example, three enemies showed in the bot lane at their tier 2 tower, including their jungler. Many times I pinged baron and said "let's go!" and the team refused to come, even though they were close by. They would rather say "noob feeder!" than win the game. Need I mention that the whole enemy team was AD? :) They put weight on your KDA score as to if you can shotcall. Rather than the objectiveness of the call, its all about reputation, which is stupid. Like WHO CARES WHO IS FEEDING, DO YOU WANT TO WIN THE GAME OR BE A MEME-ING DICKHEAD?

2) Players in low elo have no idea what their champions do for their team. They can play their champions and push buttons, but they don't know where to be, where to position, when to fight, how to fight, or what to build for games. Mid lane mages especially. Players only know how to ram into other champions and coinflip fights. And that's why you hear the classic oce low elo call in champ select "pick a tank!" "we have no tanks" "we need a tank" as they proceed to lock in some squishy jungler or top laner. "support, can you pick a tank?". LUL.

3) Players in low elo have very poor grasp of the **timing of the game**. An example is point #1 above. One of my teammates said "sure, we will do baron and they will take our bot lane tower!". Despite the fact that it would take the enemies 30 seconds to push to the bot lane inhibitor tower, and we have empowered recall from Baron buff, they refused to do it. Or the classic ping spam ??????????????? like "where were you?" when some idiot got caught out of position. "You could have helped me!" ahhh, no, it takes me 30 seconds to walk there. Or the classic (and this happens in all elos below about diamond 2 - i watch high elo games) a top laner is split pushing just past the halfway point of the river in one of the side lanes. His teammates are grouped in the middle of the map. Four enemies collapse on the split pusher, who is a fed champion. The splitpusher goes 1 for 1. Their teammates flame them for getting "caught out". The real issue with this is not what the splitpusher is doing, but WHAT ARE THEIR TEAM DOING WHILE THEY ARE DYING? They could have been doing baron, they could have pushed a tower. Most of the time you will see a bunch of monkeys rush to the splitpushers lane and try to collapse on the fight. And they get there 10 seconds later when the enemies have left. Another example on this is **recall timings**. In gold and platinum games are thrown away because players greeded for one inhibitor, or tower, got aced, and the enemies ran it mid and ended. Or.... tried to, when they greeded for the last nexus tower, and got aced themselves, and the first team ended the game after all.

So I can understand the OP's frustration, its the end of the season, and there are winning streaks as well as losing streaks. There are monkeys, boosted monkeys, and smurfs. And there is matchmaking which cannot handle it all.
thanks I know, its good to see its not just me but others who get this also.

You do know this concept applied to both side? Anyones can expect the same level of throwing from both the enemy and theirside. 

If the OP got demoted from gold to silver, it probably mean his skills level was not on that wavelength.

Just take a look at the responses bellow. None of them bring up the times their team mate carried them. No, no. it is filled with the times when their team mate failed them. Because their memory is playing selective, and it pick what suit their mindset; Which is, i dont suck, my team suck.

If you re-read my first paragraph you'll see that the point i'm making is that I can understand the OP's frustration when you can run into a series of monkeys that appear only on your team in a small sample size of games (e.g. one day's play). This can demote someone from gold to silver. From an mmr point of view, the demotion is not that large, but psychologically the player thinks it is, because then they have to win promos again to get back to their skill ceiling level.

Everyone sucks, its all relative. But my team doesn't always suck this much every game in a days play, is what they are saying.

Its kinda like the [following game](https://imgur.com/a/BIKfVmo) where the teams are not matched evenly. In my team I have two complete newbies who ended up inting and not csing, and just running around like headless chickens. Now if the OP gets these teams all day I think they have a right to be aggrieved.

If he get crap teams all day he get demoted, if he get good teams all day he get promoted, if this, if that. 

No! stop. You dont rely on luck if you want to climb rank. The chances of him getting demoted from getting a series of bad teams, is the same chance he'll get promoted from having good teams. 

The guy is simply not good enough to even float on average. For god sake, all he vsed was silver 3-4, rarely gold 5. If he cant even manage to carry at that rank, why does he think he can maintained gold??

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=SeibaPendragon

Look at the stat, bronze 1 - silver 2 -1 top. BS that he can get to gold if he cant consistently win against bronze and low silver. Check the games that he have lost, most of it is due to playing with and against gold players.

The answers is right there, just analyse it.
And now you check his rank, he is Gold 4.

> [{quoted}](name=TheDemonEmperor,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=KsaNIz7A,comment-id=000100000000000000000001,timestamp=2018-10-01T11:00:33.641+0000)
>
> If he get crap teams all day he get demoted, if he get good teams all day he get promoted, if this, if that. 
> 
> No! stop. You dont rely on luck if you want to climb rank. The chances of him getting demoted from getting a series of bad teams, is the same chance he'll get promoted from having good teams.

Sure. My point is that he can get monkeys one day and reasonable players the next. Its possible. It's very frustrating when you get the monkeys all in a row.

> If he cant even manage to carry at that rank, why does he think he can maintained gold??
> 

Carry? He's a support main.

Your point negate any sort of blame to his own performance. 

Its not that hard to play Lulu and karma support to win lane and snowball the game. Have yOU ACTUALLY LOOKED AT HIS BUILD? the guy goes dps, if he cant carry the game, then he should stop thinking that he deserve higher rank.

Look, I'm not saying he's the greatest player, BUT, he's not the one thats inting, sooking, ragequitting or trolling. It's silver and gold that we are talking about for god's sake. Players don't understand itemisation. Look at every gold 5 and under game and you will see incorrect itemisation. ALMOST EVERY GAME. Also if his teammates are monkeys maybe HE IS TRYING TO CARRY even with the limited resources that he has. Why support a monkey adc? 

[Have a look at the Karma game](https://imgur.com/a/heREZVo) closely. How much cc does the enemy team have? Lux only, really. The game is a clown fiesta (look at the number of kills). But the Ashe he is with is the lowest level in the game? Both teams or adcs are low elo so they don't farm much. Towers have obviously gone down quickly, and if the Ashe is a monkey they will not get the side lane farm near tier twos or idiot teammates will take it instead of giving it to the adc.

You try to support, but when they are useless af, or are so far behind, or do the same stupid players everytime (e.g. overextending in a side lane because they are underlevelled and dying to Quinn), it's time to move on and build some damage instead. At least he has his wards item. He has a 53% winrate and was bronze the past two seasons, I think he's playing better than in the past.

I'm done talking about this topic. My whole point here is that currently there are a bunch of sooks inters and monkeys out there in silver/gold. And that could be for whatever reason (end of season, smurfs killing egotistical jackers, whatever reason). AT LEAST HES PLAYING TO WIN THE GAME.

Why do you believe what he says just because he said it? Look at the stat and analyse, go watch his replay then break them down. That game you linked me, for a suport that goes full dps, he has the lowest damage dealt, even when compared to his adc that you called garbage. If he is any better he can do so much more.

>I'm done talking about this topic. My whole point here is that currently there are a bunch of sooks inters and monkeys out there in silver/gold. And that could be for whatever reason (end of season, smurfs killing egotistical jackers, whatever reason). AT LEAST HES PLAYING TO WIN THE GAME.


Evil intents has always been a timeless act, the different between those that climb up and those that fall down is. **ABILITY**. 

Everyones that want to progress are playing to win. The predicament is, the strongs overcome hardship, despite their burdens. While the lessers, cry and reminisce their past to give themself solace.
that's not that unbalanced. From an MMR standpoint Silver 5 is often worse than Bronze 1 due to how difficult it is to demote from the 5th division of any elo bracket.

And then you look at the top and mid's winrate and come to understand they are newbies. The Veigar in this game didn't understand that to get levels and items he needs to farm not walk around randomly in the **enemy's jungle**, especially when we had no lane priority.

Just don't play ranked at all, it's as simple as that. It's boring because you do get idiots in your team and everyone flames your teammates if they do something wrong.  People who play normal games are more competent than people who play ranked. I've vsed Diamond and Plats in ranked, all of them are the same. You won't see it any different in any other elo, that's just how this game is.
then ranked is not a thing they should have honestly. just norms get rid of ranked cause its unrealistic elo ranking. trust me i ve seen diamond and plat plays there are shocking ..............
Everyone under diamond 2 in oce is a monkey.

not most of the time its bronze people that have brought accounts I know a mate that has 6 accounts he just keeps getting banned he is just terrible I have told him he is lol he just doesn't listen he ended up buying a challenge account for $150 online in OCE soooooo that explains why u got monkeys in diamond people just buy accounts online lol

Yes well silver accounts are like $10 so I get that its easier to buy one than level an account. I think Riot should put a cap on ranked, like you cannot play ranked until you own 10 champions with at least level 6 mastery. And like Locodoco agreed with me on stream yesterday, the Tutorial needs to explain what experience and csing actually does. People rush into ranked without having a clue that this is important. They play like its call of duty.
It was an interesting discussion because one guy said "but league has so many resources online LUL, you just go to youtube LUL" and Locodoco disagreed stating that if a complete newbie youtubed "How to play adc" he comes up with a lot of stuff thats simply out of date (Graves ADC) but also the clickbait titles (in one video he clicked on we saw QTPie trolling with Yasuo bot lane). Plus the fact that newbies don't want to go out of the game to a completely different site to learn stuff - they want to get playing as soon as possible!

The skill in this game is so trash right now. In fact I would say that skill level in BRONZE at the start of season 5 was higher than the skill level this season a whole division more (so if Bronze 1 we talk about Silver 1 etc). 

S5 ADC: Let's freeze, they cannot walk up. S8 ADC: What is freezing?
S5 ADC: Go roam, I'll shove and then get a pickaxe. S8 ADC: I need a BF sword, I'll stay while we have no vision and you are roaming.
S8 Support: Just back together and get a pickaxe. S8 ADC: No I need a BF sword even though the opposition only have a longsword.
S5 Support: push for level 2! S8 ADC: Stop hitting my minions!
S5 Mid Lane Lux: I'll push wave into tower to bounce it. S8 Mid Lane Lux: I can do anything vs Fizz, he's weak.
S5 Jungler: Its mid game I should be near my team while they group near baron. S8 Jungler: Meh, we are behind, I'll take a tower and show these laners how its done.
S5 Top Laner: OK enemy bot got to lane with less mana. That means enemy jungler will be here around 2:45-3:00, I'll push now and ward at about 2:30. S8 Top Laner: Hashinshin is right, this champion (insert champion's name) is broken!

Absolutely brainless.

Are you ready for worlds and the absolute demolition of western teams? Not just talking about OPL here. NALCS was at an all time skill low for me. Fnatic in EU look reasonable (if their support doesn't int while warding) and maybe Vitality can go ok on occasion, but the rest will be absolutely demolished. Team Liquid think they are good, but they don't communicate well enough or quickly enough. C9 is hyped up but their jungle will be exposed. And 100 Thieves? Haha. How they got to worlds is kinda like very lucky. They will be absolutely trounced. And why is this? Not enough practice. 1 month of soloqueue in Korea cannot make up for a year's zookeeping with the monkeys on the NA server. They scraped through on championship points and that's it. Their bot lane will be absolutely violated, and Ssumday will have to think about putting money before a chance at a real team in Korea.

Dire Wolves? Can they beat the easy Mexican team without Shernfire? Maybe. EDG? Not a chance. Prediction: 1-3 in play-ins, and lose the playoff to the Mexicans.

Currently 1-2 and have to beat EDG to stay alive. Good luck boys.

By the way, on stream today it was very interesting how Dardoch says that some NA teams don't even show up on time for their scrims, or they just run if down if they "feel tilted" during the scrims. He said that sometimes teams would even cancel their scrim blocks on the day, and other teams would not play the full amount of games.

Weak. Western. Mentality. Exposed.

There is a big market for accounts in league. They sell accounts to people that are Diamond, they then let them play for a month before reclaiming the account by saying they were hacked and recover it. This kind of does ruin the experience, especially when you have idiots on your team and they don't. Ranked is the luck of a draw which makes it bullshit to climb because you gain like 15lp and lose 20. Even with my friends high mmr, he was gaining 25mmr and lost 20 per game (100 wins, 30 losses @ Diamond rank).  

Not only that but it's a stressful game when it counts towards something. When people get autofilled for not getting their lane and then decide to troll because they cbf'd playing since they didn't get their lane, it gets really frustrating. 

I've seen people just run it down mid for no reason at all, and still never got banned for it because they never said a word (making reports useless since apparently it's automated). If you want to have fun playing this game, normals is what you should be playing. Yes, it is a bit too easy but  it's better than dealing with all that stress you get from ranked.

I played like 7 normal games and only lost 2 games. Those 2 losses were because one of our teamates decided it was ok to stay top (and never leave top), allowing their top laner to get fed off of other lanes etc. 

My point is, in normals you're less likely to get idiots than you are with ranked.
